DarkHawk:

The male's gund exploted and that infuriate Darkhawk whose took =
one of his metallic feahters and useing them as swords  hit the crossbow an=
d destroy it  while he yelled "No more mr. Nice!!!"

After that the trow aw=
ay his feahters and started to punch Savagely Tucson "YOU WILL REGRET THE D=
AY THAT YOU CAME HERE SCRAPLING!!!!" 


From: Sandy 
Sent: Monday, February=
 22, 2010 11:51 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: Recovering Rodi=
mus/BlackFortress


  
The dart has a quick effect on Rat Trap.

" You can =
freeze me but - ya ain't gonna - shut me up!" 

Determination once again bo=
ils inside Tucson's spark. His will to continue his fight, and his vigilanc=
e slowly overpowers his paraylasis, as he forces his arm to reach over his =
back, to his cross bow, as it shakes violently while trying to overpower th=
e effects of the dart. He grits his teeth and manages to regain part of his=
 strength in his right arm. His shooting arm! And seeing that Darkhawk was =
right over him, it was his turn to make a move. 

With an unpredictability =
that clearly spelled his name, Tucson sends a sonar signal, aims, and shoot=
s at Darkhawk with a lightning reflex, sending an arrow clear into the dart=
 riffle, in an attempt to disable the weapon!

" Check mate."

> 
> While inside Tu=
csons' helmet, Rat Trap quickly delivers a shot of concentrated Energon via=
 a fine needle. He knew he had to wake up the Autobot in a hurry, and this =
was the only way he knew how.
> 
> "Sorry Wheels, gotta do this."
> 
> With=
 the injection Tucson gasps for air and comes back online. The jolt is enou=
gh to return his energy levels to a reasonable percentage, but not enough t=
o unfreeze his body. He could feel Rat Trap in his helmet, yet he sensed th=
at he was a friend. He remains quiet.
> 
> "And - what the slag do you expe=
ct - to get out of me? Ever - hear of the - term, Classified information? W=
ell, that's what my information is. Classified."
> 
> He says in a cold ton=
e of voice to Zarak. His optics narrow fiercely.
> He was not through fight=
ing yet. Rat Trap gathers a bit of courage and comes out from inside his he=
lmet.quickly move
> 
> "Rat Trap Maximize!"
> 
> He transforms into Maximal=
 form right in front of Zarak.
> 
> " That's right lizard lips! He don't ha=
ve ta tell you slag! And know somethn' else?! He's got more courage than al=
l of you uglies put tagether! He's fightn' this battle all by himself, vers=
us you guys who have ta keep backn' each other up! AND THAT GOES FOR THE FO=
RMER AHEM, NOW ABSCENT RODIMUS PRIME! GAG ME! HE AIN'T NEVER GONNA HOLD A C=
ANDLE UP TA OPTIMUS PRIME, EVER!"
> 
> Tucson gasps.
> 
> "Rat - Trap, be -=
 careful."
> 
> Rat Trap grunts.
> 
> " It's true wheels! If anyone should =
lead the Autobots, it's you! You got the heart, the spark, the courage, the=
 strength, the compassion, and the will ta fight! No matter what came down =
the pike! "
> 
> Tucson sighs.
> 
> "My - name is Tucson."
> 
> Rat Trap no=
w stands in front of Tucson.
> 
> "Not for long it ain't gonna be. You got =
the spark of Optimus Prime, you're it, you're the bot! EAT THIS RODDIE! LON=
G LIVE TUCSON PRIME!"
> 
> Tucson gasps again in shock.
> 
> "Rat Trap, ple=
ase, watch your words."
> 
> Rat Trap shrugs.
> 
> "Couldn't help myself, I=
 got a big mouth for a little rat."
>
